import axios from 'axios'; import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; export default function Viewkhohang() { const [khohang, setData] = useState({}); const { id_kho } = useParams(); // Sử dụng id_kho thay vì ma_kho_hang useEffect(() => { axios.get(`http://localhost:5000/api/getkhohang/${id_kho}`) .then((res) => setData({ ...res.data[0] })); }, [id_kho]); return (

Thông tin kho hàng

); }
